casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 6, 2010

[Cite as 04/00/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-1534.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Extension of Filing Deadline.

In anticipation of possible limited access to the Supreme Court Clerk’s Office on April 9, 2010,

It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that documents due to be filed in the Supreme Court by the deadline of April 9, 2010, may be accepted for filing on April 12, 2010.

Pfeifer, Acting C.J.
